header.title: Hillary, The Artful Dodger, Tidies Up

title: Hillary, The Artful Dodger, Tidies Up
content:
Secretary of State Hillary Clintonâ€™s appearances today before separate House and Senate committees investigating the... <!--more--> Sept.
11 attack on the US consulate in Benghazi, Libya, will be nothing more than a bit of light housekeeping before she bolts the Obama administration and tends solely to her personal and political ambitions.
The artful dodger once again will triumph over truth.
Leid Stories explains the how and why.
